text: (minisune!) ahashida, bhumiyehida, æti dæya niyata vasayenma allah obata vasanga kara di ætteya yannada, ohu tama varaprasadayan guptavada, prasiddhiyeda, oba kerehi pahala kara ætteya yannada, oba dutuve nædda? (me siyalla mese tibiyadi) minisungen samaharek adhyapana dænuma ho (tarkanukula) rju margaya ho alokamat dharma (granthayehi sadhakayan) ho nomætiva allah gæna (nikarune) tarka karannaha.”
